body_html:
@pjh5,
No, I am not getting any warnings in the notebooks that I am running from https://github.com/caffe2/tutorials

Some of these notebooks are authored with Python2 and need to be modified for Python3

I am documenting everything I did to overcome errors / warnings for future readers who may come across similar errors / warnings. Hopefully it will benefit all.

I will try and run multi-gpu-training notebook in the next few hours and post an update.

I will close this thread / issue thereafter. Please bear with me and thank you for your help!

body:
@pjh5,
No, I am not getting any warnings in the notebooks that I am running from [https://github.com/caffe2/tutorials](https://github.com/caffe2/tutorials)

Some of these notebooks are authored with Python2 and need to be modified for Python3

I am documenting everything I did to overcome errors / warnings for future readers who may come across similar errors / warnings. Hopefully it will benefit all.

I will try and run multi-gpu-training notebook in the next few hours and post an update.

I will close this thread / issue thereafter. Please bear with me and thank you for your help!
